about_the_game:
Welcome to the underworld of Tokyo, where you will experience the thrilling and dangerous life of a yakuza. In this simulation action-adventure game, you will take on the role of a new recruit who wants to make a name for himself in the city. You will have to prove your loyalty, skill, and cunning to your bosses and rivals, as you rise through the ranks of the yakuza hierarchy.



You will have a lot of freedom and choices in how you play the game. You can extort businesses, drive cars, buy shops, earn money, be a drug dealer and more. You can also explore the vibrant and realistic city of Tokyo, where you will find many side missions, activities, and secrets to discover.


But be careful, as your actions will have consequences. You will have to deal with the police, rival gangs, and internal conflicts within your own organization. You will also have to balance your reputation, money, and health, as you face the challenges and opportunities of being a yakuza.

Are you ready to enter the world of Tokyo Mafia Simulator? Download the game now and find out!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: Tokyo Mafia Simulator is an simulation action-adventure game where you experience the thrilling and dangerous life of a yakuza in Tokyo. You can extort, steal, hit, protect, date, and more, as you rise through the ranks of the underworld.
